Description.Name: Structural Repair
Description.Details: Crashing a ship into a moon causes all sorts of damage, both visible and hidden. From the looks of this mess, the pirates also looted structure and key components of the ship. Because of this the Argo can only go at less than half her speed or she will break apart.

AssignedCastDescription: Commander: I have been able to make some basic structural repairs to the Argo to make it space worthy, but further repairs are a must if we are to upgrade other systems of the ship.
